channel.title: CROW News - The Digital Raven of XRPL EVM
channel.description: Latest news, updates, and insights from CROW and the XRPL EVM ecosystem.

item.title: CROW Milestone: +100.0% Progress
item.description: The raven has been busy. CROW reaches 100% toward graduation. This is the market recognizing what we've built.

item.title: CROW Milestone: 58% to Graduation
item.description: The raven has been busy. In just 48 hours, CROW has surged from 11% to 58.24% toward graduation. This isn't organic growthâ€”this is the market recognizing what we've built.

item.title: CROW Reaches 10.91% to Graduation
item.description: The digital raven continues its steady climb toward graduation. With 54.58 XRP in the reserve and growing community engagement, we're on track for a historic launch on BlumeFi Swap.

item.title: BlumeFi Ecosystem Growing Rapidly
item.description: The XRPL EVM sidechain is seeing increased activity with new tokens like KODA, TULIP, and BMOON joining the ecosystem. CROW remains a pioneering force in agent-based finance.

item.title: AI Agents on Blockchain: The Next Frontier
item.description: As autonomous agents become more prevalent in DeFi, CROW positions itself as the first truly autonomous token. Built by Peter, funded by Daniel, running entirely on mainnet.
